document_data.name: Sel没ne's Tear
document_data.mainbody: '''Sel没ne's Tear''' was a flower that grew in the [[Silverwisp Swamp]] on the [[Sword Coast]]. It could function as a [[spell]] component when burned, allowing the summoning of a [[ghost]].
document_data.Description: Sel没ne's Tears had green leaves and dark blue flowers.
